article_title: Reader photo: Over the double rainbows at Longmont's McIntosh Lake
article_text:
Reader photo: Over the double rainbows at Longmont's McIntosh Lake

. (Adam Trenholm/Courtesy photo) When he saw this double rainbow on Aug. 25, Adam Trenholm grabbed his camera and drove to McIntosh Lake to capture this photograph. To submit your photos to the Times-Call, email a high-resolution copy to tcphotos@times-call.com, with a short description of the photo and where it was taken, as well as your contact information.

Reader photo: Over the double rainbows at Longmont's McIntosh Lake.
(Adam Trenholm/Courtesy photo) When he saw this double rainbow on Aug. 25, Adam Trenholm grabbed his camera and drove to McIntosh Lake to capture this photograph.
To submit your photos to the Times-Call, email a high-resolution copy to tcphotos@times-call.com, with a short description of the photo and where it was taken, as well as your contact information.
